roleset.name: wish

example.name: rarely with benefactive
example.text: Industry executives are wishing Mr. Achenbaum well.

example.name: sentential wish
example.text: A reinsurance company effectively insures insurance companies that *trace* wish to spread the risk of a particular policy.
example.arg: to spread the risk of a particular policy

roleset.note: Member of Vncls wish-62, long-32.2-1. Comparison with 'want'. Or not.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'wish' based on sentences in financial subcorpus.
